Title: 🔁🖼 🇺🇸❌🇷🇺 — Via its social media, the American Private Milit...
Description: Forwarded From Bellum Acta - Intel, Urgent News and Archives🇺🇸❌🇷🇺 — Via its social media, the American Private Military Company - Forward Observation Group- (FOG) confirmed that its mercenaries are taking part on the Ukrainian incursion in Kursk oblast ➡️ On August 16, 2024, the American private military company Forward Observations Group (FOG), consisting of former US Marines and special forces, acknowledged the participation of its soldiers in the Ukrainian offensive near Kursk.➡️ FOG social networks published a photograph of American military personnel on Russian territory with a geotag indicating their presence in the Kursk region. The Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs protested to the United States in connection with the participation of the American military in operations on the territory of the Russian Federation🔗 Link
